attributes.action: change the proposed names of the Astute class submarines being built to famous submarine names and not those of old battleships
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The latest class of British nuclear submarines are the 'Astute' class, and the first three names reflect well-known submarines of the previous 'A' Class - Astute, Artful and Ambush. Now it is proposed that the next three submarine names will be 'Audacious', 'Anson' and 'Agamemnon' - famous ship names but previously used on very old battleships - with no connection whatsoever with submarines. The 'old' A class also had the traditional names Amphion, Aeneas, Artemis, Alliance, Affray, Acheron, Alaric, Alcide, Alderney, Anchorite, Andrew, Auriga and Aurochs.
